whether forecasts from deep learning models have skill or not.
 How to develop Multilayer Perceptron, Convolutional Neural Network, Long Short-Term
Memory Networks, and hybrid neural network models for time series forecasting.
 How to forecast univariate, multivariate, multi-step, and multivariate multi-step time
series forecasting problems in general.
 How to transform sequence data into a three-dimensional structure in order to train
convolutional and LSTM neural network models.
